summary: Makes Clavicus Vile\'s Mask Upgradeable from a workbench.
descriptionHtml:
*Note* 

This mod is far overshadowed by the Lost Art of the Blacksmith by Impulseve.

I would strongly recommend using that mod unless you JUST want to upgrade Clavicus\'s Headgear.

You can find the mod here: 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1020








Makes Clavicus Vile\'s Mask Upgradeable from a workbench, uses armor upgrade info from Deadric Smithing perk and requires a Deadra Heart per upgrade. Pretty simple.


Installation: 

Put the Clavicus_Mask_Upgrade.esp file in your data folder in Skyrim\'s directory. 

Distribution: 

Feel free to include this in other mods, just notify me first please.
author: Malchus
